markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Single Action" />concentrate, Interact;  **Frequency** once per minute;   **Effect** You point the _compass of transpositional awareness_ at an extant [teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156) effect (such as a magical portal) or the site of a teleportation effect that existed within the last 1 minute (such as the space where a creature just cast [_dimension door_](/Spells.aspx?ID=69)). Attempt an [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) check to determine to where the effect leads or led. The DC of this check is the effect's [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) DC. On a success, you know roughly the destination of the teleportation effect (for example “the [Plane of Fire](/Planes.aspx?ID=6),” “north,” or “Avistan”). On a critical success, you ascertain the exact destination within mere feet for local effects (such as _dimension door_) or within a few miles for long-range effects (such as [_teleport_](/Spells.aspx?ID=338), [_plane shift_](/Spells.aspx?ID=222), or interdimensional portals).
name: concentrate, Interact
